snippet.title: FULL PROLOGUE AND DOWNLOAD LINK - Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts (updated)
snippet.description:
Game Download Link: https://gamejolt.com/games/DanganronpaRR/429373

Discord link: https://discord.gg/zk3JHfJ

Game Creator - StephenW313

Character Designs Made By - StephenW313

Monokuma made by - Spike Chunsoft

Music By - Masafumi Takada (Taken from danganronpa 2, V3)

Coder - StephenW313

Artist - StephenW313

Pixel Artist - StephenW313

Every Chapter's Basic Script Written By - StephenW313

That Script Edited And Reviewed By - Calobi49, Neryxocturna, xoMax, semi, irontwo

Prologue's Dialogue Written By - StephenW313

Found bugs/typos in the prologue: naft614, Xyerose, Alenoba, Calobi49, Neryxocturna

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Voice Actors:

Kim Davis - VampireBre

Glenn Anderson - naft614

Marie Lambert - nosharcade

Victor Moore - souleaterwill

Norah Yates - starlight-mayhem

Julien Sanchez - Calobi49

Melody Pierce - DR_FriendlyFacade

Jesse Miles - StephenW313

Harmony Campos - Xyerose

Marcus Ziegler - YumeDeku

Autumn Palmer - Sakura Schwein

Dennis Wells - Ozone454


Hunter Murphy - Mypooka

Angela Lovell - Arvela

Emily Price - Unii

Alexander Normandy - Japaria

Monokuma - Brian Beacock (Voice lines taken from Danganronpa 2 Goodbye Despair)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tools used:

Fungus (dialogue)

Bolt (visual scripting)

Unity (Game Engine)

----------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want to contact StephenW313 for any reason (volunteering, just wanting to say hi, showing fan works) 
you can contact him through discord or gmail.

Discord:

Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts discord invite: https://discord.gg/zk3JHfJ
Discord server members have early access to chapters, as well as getting previews for upcoming content every so often.

If you don't want to join the public discord but still want to contact me through discord, my tag is StephenW313#0620

Gmail:

stephenwilliams1331@gmail.com

-------------------------------------------------

Danganronpa Rocky Restarts related social media and links:

Twitter: @DRestarts (Not very active cause I don't really like twitter, if you wanna run this page feel free to ask!)

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/zk3JHfJ (already mentioned this above)

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg6vFBmjim0WiJZk7eTZQmA (my personal youtube channel, but for now and until the game is finished, I'll only be posting Rocky Restarts related stuff)
